pkgmetadata.longdescription: General Effect Modelling // Two-step modeling with separation of sources of variation through analysis of variance and subsequent multivariate modeling through a range of unsupervised and supervised statistical methods. Separation can focus on removal of interfering effects or isolation of effects of interest. EF Mosleth et al. (2021) doi:10.1038/s41598-021-82388-w and EF Mosleth et al. (2020) doi:10.1016/B978-0-12-409547-2.14882-6.
